# TVCaptionButtonViewMotionDirection.horizontal

**Case**

The caption button view can tilt in the horzontal direction.

## Declaration

```swift
case horizontal
```

## Tilt Directions

- **TVCaptionButtonViewMotionDirection.all**: The caption button view can tilt in all directions.
- **TVCaptionButtonViewMotionDirection.none**: The caption button view can’t tilt.
- **TVCaptionButtonViewMotionDirection.vertical**: The caption button view can tilt in the vertical direction.
